attributes.action: Recognise the human rights of garment makers and their employees in all other countries of the globe. To bring about legislation making clothing retailers in noticable writing state the country of origin of the product and it's fabrics. To make UK retailers publicly liable for any human rights abuses which occured while it's products where being made.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is created in order to help those suffering human rights abuses while making clothing garments for the UK market. To make UK companies more liable for any human rights abuses occurred while the products/product is being made.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
